<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Concrete Cutting Operator]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Concrete Cutting Operator
  
 
  
This job opening is for our Kennewick, Washington location. Starting wage $20+/hour (depending on experience)
  
 
  
We are a thriving construction company based in Murray, Utah that offers its employees a career path, competitive compensation, and full benefits.
  
 
  

  
 
  
Who is A-Core?
  
 
  
A-Core Concrete Specialists is a growing and thriving, family owned construction company based in Murray, Utah. We have 13 locations from Washington to Texas, that work together to get projects done all across the United States. After being in business for over 45 years, we've evolved and grown into a company that over 350 people call… home.
  
 
  

  
+ We have a variety of medical,dental, vision, and life insurance options for all full-time employees
  

  
+ At A-Core, we want you to build a career here. We invest in the future of our people and our 401k plan is the perfect example of that
  

  
+ Our culture is both nurturing and motivating - to help you feel appreciated and encouraged everyday
  

  
 
  
If you are ready to take a leap in the right direction and be a part of the A-Core Team… JOIN US TODAY!
  
 
  

  
 
  
Details: We're looking for a full-time Concrete Cutting Operator to join our Kennewick, Washington branch.
  
 
  

  
+ Perform a variety of concrete cutting and core drilling projects.
  

  
+ Maintain equipment and ensure that all tools are being used safely.
  

  
+ Complete all preparation and clean up responsibilities before and after project completion.
  

  
 
  

  
 
  
Requirements:
  
 
  

  
+ Drug Screen (Required)
  

  
+ Valid Driver's License (Required)
  

  
+ Ability to pass a DOT physical (Required)
  

  
+ 1+ year of concrete cutting experience (Preferred)
  

  
+ Maintain a positive and responsible work environment
  

  
+ Ability to follow processes, be organized and punctual
  

  
+ Motivated to be self-starter with the ability to also work in a team environment
  

  
 
  

  
 
  
Responsibilities:
  
 
  

  
+ Operate, or be willing to learn to operate wall saws, core drills, flat saws, hand tools, and power tools.
  

  
+ Maintain equipment and ensure that all tools are being used safely.
  

  
+ Comply with all safety policies and procedures
  

  
+ Manage workflow to meet changing priorities
  

  
+ Effectively use the daily documentation software
  

  
 
  

  
 
  
Why Should You Apply?
  
 
  

  
+ Full Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance (after 60 days)
  

  
+ 401k with Company match (after 60 days)
  

  
+ Paid time off, that starts upon hire
  

  
+ Competitive compensation
  

  
 
  

  
 
  
View ALL of our open positions at www.a-core.com/careers (http://www.a-core.com/careers)
  
 
  
Take a glimpse into why A-Core is the BEST place to work --> VIDEO LINK (https://vimeo.com/451597844)
  
 
  

  
  
  

  

  
All A-Core Inc. employees are expected to completely adhere to the safety policies practiced throughout the construction industry.
  

<script id="detrack" defer src="https://d2e48ltfsb5exy.cloudfront.net/p/t.js?i=0,1" data-g="245BADF827714601AA2BDC6BB62E5DF9105"></script>]]></description>

        <location><![CDATA[Kennewick, WA, 99336, USA]]></location>
